TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Uniquifier extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods for manipulating string identifiers.
Docs.remarks: See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information and examples.

Docs.param: The maximum length of the identifier.
An optional number that will be appended to the identifier.
Docs.summary: Ensures the given identifier is shorter than the given length by removing the extra characters from the end.
